nodes.bodyText: A class already has this name in nm.client.world. Maybe it should be prefixed with Realms and moved in realms packages as it is only used there?
getPlayerInteractionManager should suffice, but that's a detail
Hum, I think this class is more like a "RegistryReadyWorldView" but other people have probably better ideas
